title: GDP per capita of Indian states in financial year 21-22
selftext:
I have seen a lot of choropleth (data maps) creators don't use a color that represents the actual situation. Like someone posted about domestic violence, and they arbitrarily chose green color for states with less than 30% cases and yellow for some neutral point and red for higher than that.

But any number of cases can't be considered green, it is such a sensitive issue.

My aim would be to create maps that take care of such details, and clarity will have higher priority than aesthetics on any day.

https://preview.redd.it/hlagjdpw2ldc1.png?width=1160&format=png&auto=webp&s=19172722ce840b2c0b7882b0f222155d63f72fb8
comments: I think newer data was published some time back . You can check and map that also .
For the country as a whole, yes but the data is missing for a significant number of states for 22-23 on the official site of RBI
